matchAllFromXForwardedFor.title: Use X-Forwarded-For header
matchAllFromXForwardedFor.description: Extract and check all IPs from X-Forwarded-For header. Not applicable to Native Kafka APIs (no HTTP headers).

customIPAddress.title: Custom IP Address (support comma separated list)
customIPAddress.description: Support EL (ex: {#request.headers['X-Forwarded-For']}). For Native Kafka, only the first IP from comma-separated values is used.

whitelistIps.title: IPs Whitelist (CIDR and hosts allowed)
whitelistIps.description: List of IPs to allow in the request. Each entry may be a comma-separated list. Hostnames are for HTTP/MESSAGE only, and not Native Kafka.

blacklistIps.title: IPs Blacklist (CIDR and hosts allowed)
blacklistIps.description: List of IPs to disallow in the request. Each entry may be a comma-separated list. Hostnames are for HTTP/MESSAGE only, and not Native Kafka.

lookupIpVersion.title: Lookup IP version to use (default is ALL)
lookupIpVersion.description: If you're not sure your DNS server can handle multi-question requests (both V4 and V6) specify a version. Only applicable to HTTP/MESSAGE APIs (not Native Kafka).

isInclusiveHostCount.title: Inclusive Host Count
isInclusiveHostCount.description: If true, include the network and broadcast addresses (useful for CIDR/31 and CIDR/32).
